preview: The protection of food products takes center stage
The food product-package is one inseparable unit

For food packaging both direct and indirect sustainability effects must
be considered

table_data: The protection of food products takes center stage
The food product-package is one inseparable unit

For food packaging both direct and indirect sustainability effects must
be considered
Food packaging is a resource, not litter
Avoidance of food packaging is not always the best option
Sustainable food packaging development, in practice, is a balancing act

Multidisciplinary approach is needed to create sustainable food packaging
solutions
Not all food packaging innovation is sustainable
Context (local) is key to food packaging sustainability

Regulatory landscape of sustainable food packaging is not fully
comprehensive

Consumer knowledge and awareness on sustainable food packaging is
limited

Food packaging is an information source on both product and packaging
sustainability
